name: breakout...?
description:
TUTORIAL AND DEVELOPER'S NOTE

SPACE - to start and shoot balls

A / D - to move left and right

LEFT / RIGHT arrow keys - also work for moving

ESC / P - to (un)pause

you get balls every 50 scores or from hitting white blocks

DEVELOPER'S NOTE: as I roll out new updates and changes to the game, your highscore will get reset. Sorry about that, I'm looking into fixes soon!
